00025 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
00026 {
00027   createinfo(argc, argv);
00028   
00029   if (argc < 2) {
00030     fprintf(stderr, "\nusage: %s slaterdetfile\n", argv[0]);
00031     exit(-1);
00032   }
00033   
00034   char* slaterdetfile = argv[optind];
00035 
00036   SlaterDet Q, Qp;
00037   readSlaterDetfromFile(&Q, slaterdetfile);
00038   initSlaterDet(&Q, &Qp);
00039 
00040   copySlaterDet(&Q, &Qp);
00041   invertSlaterDet(&Qp);
00042 
00043   SlaterDetAux X;
00044   initSlaterDetAux(&Q, &X);
00045 
00046   calcSlaterDetAuxod(&Q, &Q, &X);
00047   double ovld = creal(X.ovlap);
00048 
00049   calcSlaterDetAuxod(&Q, &Qp, &X);
00050   double ovle = creal(X.ovlap);
00051 
00052   double norm = sqrt(ovld);
00053   double normp = sqrt(0.5*(ovld+ovle));
00054   double normm = sqrt(0.5*(ovld-ovle));
00055 
00056   complex double tcmd;
00057   calcSlaterDetAuxod(&Q, &Q, &X);
00058   calcTCMod(&Q, &Q, &X, &tcmd);
00059 
00060   complex double tcme;
00061   calcSlaterDetAuxod(&Q, &Qp, &X);
00062   calcTCMod(&Q, &Qp, &X, &tcme);
00063 
00064   double tcm = tcmd/ovld;
00065   double tcmp = (tcmd+tcme)/(ovld+ovle);
00066   double tcmm = (tcmd-tcme)/(ovld-ovle);
00067 
00068   double a = Q.A*0.75/(tcm*(mproton*Q.Z+mneutron*Q.N));
00069   double ap = Q.A*0.75/(tcmp*(mproton*Q.Z+mneutron*Q.N));
00070   double am = Q.A*0.75/(tcmm*(mproton*Q.Z+mneutron*Q.N));
00071 
00072   fprintinfo(stdout);
00073 
00074   fprintf(stdout, "norm: %15.8e\n", norm);
00075   fprintf(stdout, "norm pi=+1: %15.8e\n", normp);
00076   fprintf(stdout, "norm pi=-1: %15.8e\n", normm);
00077 
00078   fprintf(stdout, "effective width a: %15.8e\n", a);
00079   fprintf(stdout, "effective width a pi=+1: %15.8e\n", ap);
00080   fprintf(stdout, "effective width a pi=-1: %15.8e\n", am);
00081 
00082   return 0;
00083 }
